title: How do singers sing so good? - Quora

response.answer_text: How do athletes or anyone get better and good at something? They train or get taught by someone who has a lot of experience, they go home and study or practice, and they become good at what they do. If they train or practice more they get even better. Funny how desire and a little work will do that, isn't it?

Years of tuition and practice. Then more years of performance and practice. Did I mention they practice a lot? They are also paranoid about even the slightest hint of any illness that may affect their voice, and have throat lozenges and other medication with them at all times. Don’t even think about coughing or sneezing while you are in the same room.
